data.title: Fototeca Gilardi > Photo FTT5920: WEDDING OF GIOVANNA DI SAVOIA AND KING BORIS
data.meta_description: visualizza questa photo relativa a "WEDDING GIFTS "One of the most polite episodes of Sofia's wedding parties took place at the exit of King Boris (30 January 1894 - 28 August 1943) and Queen Giovanna (13 November 1907 - 26 February 2000) from the Cathedral, immediately after the celebration official of marriage. A host of people's maidens met the royal couple, throwing flowers and spreading them on the steps of the temple, while the solemn archbishops of the Holy Synod crowned the Augusti Sposi. " Already married civilly and catholic in Assisi on October 25 according to her customs, the royal couple replied to the marriage in Sofia with the Orthodox rite, according to his faith. Drawing by Achille Beltrame (19 March 1871 - 19 February 1945) for the cover of "La Domenica del Corriere". Milan, November 16, 1930" su Fototeca Gilardi
